title: Iron Steak and Bar
details: IRON STEAK AND BAR, where you can enjoy a range of world class dishes including mouth-watering steaks flame grilled to perfection on our imported Spanish Vulcano Grez grill.

title: The Butcher Shop and Grill
details: The Butcher Shop and Grill offers the best red meat and wine meals. Best meat restaurant, best private dining, butcher shop in Cape Town.

title: City Grill Steakhouse
details: City Grill is based on a one-of-a-kind food concept showcasing South African Traditional food fare that we are known and loved for around the world.

title: The Hussar Grill
details: The Hussar Grill welcomes you into the world of one of South Africa's premier grill rooms.
